showOverlayOnCursorMove.title: Show on Cursor Move
showOverlayOnCursorMove.description: When enabled, the hover overlay will appear when your cursor rests on a symbol. When disabled, the hover overlay wonâ€™t appear for the token under the cursor until you invoke the **Pulsar Hover: Toggle** command.

showOverlayOnMouseMove.title: Show on Mouse Move
showOverlayOnMouseMove.description: When enabled, the hover overlay will appear when the mouse pointer rests on a symbol.

hoverTime.title: Hover Delay Time
hoverTime.description: How long (in milliseconds) to wait before asking for hover information on mouse or cursor rest; also how long for the hover overlay to linger after mouse or cursor movement.
